### Source code
https://github.com/ryanym/cs7641/tree/master/assignment2

### Directory Structure
```
tree
.
├── data
│   ├── madelon_train.data
│   ├── madelon_train.labels
│   ├── online_shoppers_intention.csv
│   └── phishing_websites.csv
├── figures
│   └── TSP_sa_init_temp.png
├── knapsack.ipynb
├── NN.ipynb
├── nqueen.ipynb
├── output
│   ├── KS
│   ├── NQ
│   └── TSP
├── README.txt
└── tsp.ipynb

```
**data** directory contains both Phishing Websites dataset and Online Shoppers dataset  
**figures** directory contains all plots generated by the experiments  
**output** directory contains all model performance data generated by the experiments    

### To Run Code ###
Knapsack: knapsack.ipynb
Travelling Salesmans: tsp.ipynb
N-Queens: nqueen.ipynb
Neural Network: NN.ipynb

### Dependencies 
- Python 3.+
- numpy
- pandas
- matplotlib
- sklearn
- seaborn
- mlrose_hiive
